Name: BC Rail
Notes: Terminal railway that is the last publicly managed portion of a formerly large scale system ; the BC government still technically owns the North Vancouver to Prince George line , although it is leased to and managed by CN

Name: Englewood Railway
Notes: Privately owned ; not a common carrier

Name: Grand Forks Railway Inc
Locale: Grand Forks to Grand Forks Jct
Ownership: International Forest Products Ltd. d.b.a . Interfor and Regional District of Kootenay Boundary

Name: Kelowna Pacific Railway
Notes: Fallen Flag . Went into receivership in 2013 . Ownership of infrastructure reverted to CNR . As of Nov 2015 the Coldstream to Kelowna portion was abandoned and torn up

Name: Kettle Falls International Railway
Locale: Laurier , WA to Grand Forks & Carson and Waneta to Columbia Gardens
Notes: Majority of the line 's trackage is contained in the US
